content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Hey there! I’m really sorry you ran into an issue when you tried to kick me into “BIG IDEA mode” with a prompt for an immediately actionable idea. I appreciate you flagging this—it’s super helpful for me to know what went wrong so we can tackle it together. Let’s break this down and figure out what happened, why it might’ve failed, and how we can get back on track.
